Class MainApplication

    • javafx.application.Application

  • public class MainApplication
extends javafx.application.Application
    Manages the JavaFX Application. The application is created by calling init(Dimension, int, Consumer).

      • init

        public static void init​(Dimension gridSize,
                        int blockSize,
                        java.util.function.Consumer<GameFrame> task)
        Initializes the application, when done, calls task.
        Parameters:
        gridSize - Number of rows and columns of the game board's grid.
        blockSize - The width/height of one cell in the game's board.
        task - Called when the application is ready to use.

      • launch

        public static void launch()

      • start

        public void start​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        Automatically called when the application is ready. Cunfigures the window's common properties. When done, calls readyTask.
        Specified by:
        start in class javafx.application.Application
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - Created by JavaFX platform, each GUI element's parent. Used to show the main window.
